title: The Herman Cain Award
dc:creator: WBUR
description: A deep dive into The Herman Cain Award subreddit, which ironically awards those who die from COVID after publicly expressing anti-vaxx sentiments or pandemic-denying memes online. We meet a moderator and a Herman Cain Award nominee, who may have more in common than they realize.
itunes:author: WBUR

We meet a moderator and a Herman Cain Award nominee, who may have more in common than they realize.
